Task Panel¶

The TaskPanel displays previously run Sampler instances with the time of execution, experiment, and algorithm (if applicable). Double clicking an item in the table opens a visualizer window defined in PlotWindow.py.

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QTableWidget
